home.title: Home
home.content: This quiz application is powered by GPT, offering a new and interactive way to learn and test your knowledge on a wide range of topics. Get started now and explore the endless possibilities.

chat.welcomeMessage: Welcome to our Interactive Quiz Experience! Powered by advanced AI, we're here to offer you a fun and engaging way to test your knowledge and learn something new on a wide range of topics. Let's get started!
chat.askForName: To personalize your quiz experience, could you please tell us your name?
chat.askForTopic: Great, {userName}! Now, tell us which topic you're interested in today...
chat.confirmTopic: Awesome choice, {userName}! We're excited to test your knowledge on {userTopic}. Get ready for your first question!
